snippet: A leak from a pipeline owned by a unit of the China National Petroleum Corporation introduced hazardous levels of benzene into a water system affecting more than 2.4 million people.
lead_paragraph: A leak from a pipeline owned by a unit of the China National Petroleum Corporation introduced hazardous levels of benzene into a water system affecting more than 2.4 million people.

headline.main: Crude Oil Leak in China Taints Water for Millions
headline.print_headline: Crude Oil Leak In China Taints Water for Millions
